title: Save big on any pair of AirPods you want in this huge Amazon sale
content:
Macworld

Apple’s AirPods earbuds and headphones are often on sale, but today Amazon is discounting every mode to some of the lowest prices we’ve ever seen. So whether you’re looking for the cheapest 2nd-gen AirPods to the high-end AirPods Max, you’re going to save a bundle. Here are the best prices we’ve tracked:

AirPods Pro (2nd-gen)

  • Price: $200
  • Savings: $49
  • Why you want it: Apple’s newest AirPods Pro look the same as the previous model, but they’re all-new on the inside, with better noise cancellation, battery life, and audio quality.

AirPods (3rd-gen)

  • Price: $150
  • Savings: $29
  • Why you want it: Apple’s third-gen AirPods bring a slew of upgrades over the second-gen model, including personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking, sweat and water resistance, adaptive EQ, custom drivers, and longer battery life, so they’re definitely worth the extra $50. 

AirPods (2nd-gen)

  • Price: $99
  • Savings: $30
  • Why you want it: Apple’s previous-gen AirPods don’t have a lot of the features of the third-gen model, but with great sound and fantastic battery life, they’re excellent entry-level earbuds at under $100.

AirPods Max

  • Price: $480
  • Savings: $69
  • Why you want it: The AirPods Max are Apple’s highest-end AirPods with a uniquely striking design, magnetic ear cups, noise cancelation, and excellent audio quality.
